posts.title: We're Listening: Log In Feature Added to Website Navigation
posts.text: Today we've released a new version of our website navigation that includes a log in feature.

posts.title: Introducing New Navigation Across nypl.org
posts.text: This week, we’ll be unveiling a new feature across the NYPL website: redesigned navigation menus that will improve the overall organization of the site and help you find what you're looking for more easily.

posts.title: The Transformation of nypl.org
posts.text: We need to rebuild, redesign, and reorganize. We’ve launched a web redevelopment project that will take us into next year and allow us to begin offering new interfaces, new online tools, and new ways for you to interact with NYPL.
